description: Get your chance to win one of 3 Annual, 3 Monthly, or 3 Weekly Premium Subscriptions during the 'Summer Season Giveaway'!

paragraphs.subTitle: All you need to do is follow these 4 simple steps:
paragraphs.content: Make sure you have latest update installed. The version can be viewed in the Settings of the app.
Turn On Notifications in the app Settings.
Rate Sekai AI Anime Art Generator in the App Store with a nice review, and don't forget to include your username.
Post your AI Art to the Community section of the app. Share your unique artwork and get feedback from the community!

paragraphs.subTitle: Draw Date:
paragraphs.content: The winners will be announced on September 2nd within the app.

title: API Issue Resolved
